name: Global Standard gGmbH
goal: We develop, continually revise and operate the "Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)". GOTS is the international voluntary textile processing standard based on the use of organic raw material and comprising ecological and social criteria. It covers the whole supply chain and provides for independent third party certification, based on regular inspections and tests.
euInitiatives: We have interest in EU activities concerning use of the term "organic", public procurement, textiles and apparel.
